ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T21:24:55 [Issue ID 4000-59276] urn:comicvine:4000-59276 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 00:18:03. [Issue ID 78105]
ComicInfo.Summary: It's the mind and typewriter of Spider Jerusalem versus the media, the money and the White House--and it all comes tumbling down for one of them. Right here, the rules are changed, the arena is altered, and the stakes are everything, launching us into the high-octane Year Four. "Gouge Away" part the end.
ComicInfo.Title: Gouge Away, Part Three of Three
